summary: Four friends on their way to a boxing match get caught in heavy traffic, so they take a shortcut in order to get there faster, unfortunately it leads to them witnessing a murder which leaves them running for their lives.
cast: Emilio Estevez|Cuba Gooding Jr.|Denis Leary|Stephen Dorff|Jeremy Piven|Peter Greene|Erik Schrody|Michael Wiseman|Michael DeLorenzo|Relioues Webb|Will Zahrn|Eugene Williams|Christine Harnos|Galyn GÃ¶rg|Angela Alvarado|Lauren Robinson|Doug Wert|Raichle Watt|Diedre Kelly|Kathleen Perkins|David L. Crowley|Stuart Abramson|Mark Phelan|Nigel Gibbs|Sean O'Grady|Lydell M. Cheshier|Donovan D. Ross|Michael Scranton|Robert S. Neville|Hank McGill|Darin Mangan
title: Los jueces de la noche
